A

AdminFacade - Class in coupon.sys.core.facade
this class implements the business logic of Admin
AdminFacade(CompanyDAO, CustomerDAO, CouponDAO) - Constructor for class coupon.sys.core.facade.AdminFacade
construct the Admin facade and get companyDao, customerDao and couponDao
AdminFacadeInterface - Interface in coupon.sys.core.facade
 
AdminFilter - Class in coupon.sys.services.filters
this class is a filter for path /admin/* it checks if the user have a session from type adminFacade
AdminFilter() - Constructor for class coupon.sys.services.filters.AdminFilter
 
AdminWebService - Class in coupon.sys.services.webServices
in this class all web service methods for admin user
AdminWebService() - Constructor for class coupon.sys.services.webServices.AdminWebService
 
alreadyPurchased(long) - Method in interface coupon.sys.core.dao.CustomerDAO
this method check if customer purchased the coupon already by customer id and coupon id with customer-coupon table
alreadyPurchased(long) - Method in class coupon.sys.core.dao.db.CustomerDAODb
this method check if customer purchased the coupon already by customer id and coupon id with customer-coupon table
